Member.name: ISerializer_Configure
Member.summary: Configure the serializer using relevant configuration parameter(s) in (if present)
Member.param: A collection containing configuration parameter(s) relevant to this serializer.
true: if this serializer instance is used to serialize keys, false: if this serializer instance is used to serialize values.
Member.returns: A configuration collection with configuration parameter(s) relevant to this serializer removed.

Member.name: IDeserializer_Configure
Member.summary: Configure the deserializer using relevant configuration parameter(s) in (if present).
Member.param: A collection containing configuration parameter(s) relevant to this deserializer.
true: if this deserializer instance is used to serialize keys, false: if this deserializer instance is used to serialize values.
Member.returns: A configuration collection with configuration parameter(s) relevant to this deserializer removed.
